data.lore: Malcolm Graves is a wanted man in every realm, city-state, and empire he has visited. Tough, strong-willed, and above all, relentless, through his life of crime he has amassed (then invariably lost) a small fortune.
data.name: Graves
data.title: the Outlaw

spells.tooltip: Shoots three bullets in a cone, each dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all enemies in their path. Enemies hit with multiple bullets take {{ e4 }}% damage from each additional bullet.
spells.description: Graves fires three bullets in a cone, damaging all enemies in their paths.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Shoots three bullets in a cone, each dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all enemies in their path. Enemies hit with multiple bullets take {{ e4 }}% damage from each additional bullet.
spells.name: Buckshot
spells.sanitizedDescription: Graves fires three bullets in a cone, damaging all enemies in their paths.

spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on impact and creates a smoke cloud that lasts {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies inside the cloud are slowed by {{ e2 }}% and have their sight radius reduced.
spells.description: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke. Enemies inside the smoke cloud have reduced sight range and Movement Speed.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on impact and creates a smoke cloud that lasts {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies inside the cloud are slowed by {{ e2 }}% and have their sight radius reduced.
spells.name: Smoke Screen
spells.sanitizedDescription: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke. Enemies inside the smoke cloud have reduced sight range and Movement Speed.

spells.tooltip: Dashes forward, gaining {{ e1 }}% increased Attack Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds. Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Quickdraw by {{ e4 }} second.
spells.description: Graves dashes forward gaining an Attack Speed boost for several seconds. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Dashes forward, gaining {{ e1 }}% increased Attack Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds. Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Quickdraw by {{ e4 }} second.
spells.name: Quickdraw
spells.sanitizedDescription: Graves dashes forward gaining an Attack Speed boost for several seconds. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill.

spells.tooltip: Fires an explosive shell that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy hit. After hitting an enemy Champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage in a cone.
spells.description: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Fires an explosive shell that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy hit. After hitting an enemy Champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage in a cone.
spells.name: Collateral Damage
spells.sanitizedDescription: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.

passive.name: True Grit
passive.description: Graves gains increasing Armor and Magic Resistance the longer he remains in combat.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Graves gains increasing Armor and Magic Resistance the longer he remains in combat.
